parameters.description: the account that is to perform the release.

methods.description: Sends given amount to the given name, with the from field set to a different account than the payer.  This transfer will occur in a single transaction and will be cheaper, but may reduce your privacy.

parameters.name: amount_to_transfer
parameters.description: the amount of shares to transfer

parameters.name: asset_symbol
parameters.description: the asset to transfer

parameters.name: paying_account_name
parameters.description: the source account to draw the shares from

parameters.name: from_account_name
parameters.description: the account to show the recipient as being the sender (requires account's private key to be in wallet).

parameters.name: to_account_name
parameters.description: the account to transfer the shares to

parameters.name: escrow_account_name
parameters.description: the account of the escrow agent which has the power to decide how to divide the funds among from/to accounts.

parameters.name: agreement
parameters.description: the hash of an agreement between the sender/receiver in the event a dispute arises can be given to escrow agent

parameters.name: memo_message
parameters.description: a memo to store with the transaction

parameters.name: strategy
parameters.description: enumeration [vote_recommended | vote_all | vote_none]

parameters.name: server_account
parameters.description: Name of the account of the server. The user will be shown this name as the site he is logging into.

methods.description: Completes the login procedure by finding the user's public account key and shared secret

parameters.name: server_key
parameters.description: The one-time public key from wallet_login_start.

parameters.name: client_key
parameters.description: The client's one-time public key.

parameters.name: client_signature
parameters.description: The client's signature of the shared secret.

methods.description: Set this balance's voting address and slate

parameters.name: balance_id
parameters.description: the current name of the account

parameters.name: voter_address
parameters.description: The new voting address. If none is specified, tries to re-use existing address.

parameters.name: strategy
parameters.description: enumeration [vote_recommended | vote_all | vote_none]

parameters.name: builder_path
parameters.description: If specified, will write builder here instead of to DATA_DIR/transactions/latest.trx

methods.description: Publishes the current wallet delegate slate to the public data associated with the account

parameters.name: publishing_account_name
parameters.description: The account to publish the slate ID under

parameters.name: paying_account_name
parameters.description: The account to pay transaction fees or leave empty to pay with publishing account

methods.description: Publish your current client version to the specified account's public data record

parameters.name: publishing_account_name
parameters.description: The account to publish the client version under

parameters.name: paying_account_name
parameters.description: The account to pay transaction fees with or leave empty to pay with publishing account

methods.description: Collect specified account's genesis balances

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: account to collect genesis balances for

methods.description: Collect specified account's vested balances

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: account to collect vested balances for

methods.description: Update a delegate's block signing and feed publishing key

parameters.name: authorizing_account_name
parameters.description: The account that will authorize changing the block signing key

parameters.name: delegate_name
parameters.description: The delegate account which will have its block signing key changed

parameters.name: signing_key
parameters.description: The new key that will be used for block signing

methods.description: Attempts to recover accounts created after last backup was taken and returns number of successful recoveries. Use if you have restored from backup and are missing accounts.

parameters.name: accounts_to_recover
parameters.description: The number of accounts to attept to recover

parameters.name: maximum_number_of_attempts
parameters.description: The maximum number of keys to generate trying to recover accounts

methods.description: Attempts to recover any missing recipient and memo information for the specified transaction

parameters.name: transaction_id_prefix
parameters.description: the id (or id prefix) of the transaction record

parameters.name: recipient_account
parameters.description: the account name of the recipient (if known)

methods.description: Verify whether the specified transaction made a TITAN deposit to the current wallet; returns null if not

parameters.name: transaction_id_prefix
parameters.description: the id (or id prefix) of the transaction record

methods.description: publishes a price feed for BitAssets, only active delegates may do this

parameters.name: delegate_account
parameters.description: the delegate to publish the price under

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: the number of this asset per XTS

parameters.name: asset_symbol
parameters.description: the type of asset being priced

methods.description: publish price feeds for market-pegged assets; pays fee from delegate pay balance otherwise wallet account balance

parameters.name: delegate_account
parameters.description: the delegate to publish the price under

parameters.name: symbol_to_price_map
parameters.description: maps the BitAsset symbol to its price per share

methods.description: publishes a set of feeds for BitAssets for all active delegates, most useful for testnets

parameters.name: symbol_to_price_map
parameters.description: maps the BitAsset symbol to its price per share

methods.description: tries to repair any inconsistent wallet account, key, and transaction records

parameters.name: collecting_account_name
parameters.description: collect any orphan balances into this account

methods.description: regenerates private keys as part of wallet recovery

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: the account the generated keys should be a part of

parameters.name: max_key_number
parameters.description: the last key number to regenerate

methods.description: Retract (permanently disable) the specified account in case of master key compromise.

parameters.name: account_to_retract
parameters.description: The name of the account to retract.

parameters.name: pay_from_account
parameters.description: The account from which fees will be paid.

methods.description: Generates a human friendly brain wallet key starting with a public salt as the last word
